name: Mole Control (itch)
description:
An endless mole splatting party for those who can handle 8-bit gore! Five levels, five guns, and hopefully more than five runs after you play the game!

Thank you to both SubspaceAudio, and SketchyLogic, the game wouldn't be half as good without the free sounds and music!

Music by SubspaceAudio you can find them here!  ->  https://opengameart.org/users/subspaceaudio here https://juhanijunkala.com/  here https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3wdbuL350fQVtBfWd6hErA and here https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/platformer-chiptunes-226266

Music by SketchyLogic you can find them here!  ->  https://opengameart.org/users/sketchylogic
